mapper.select: select id, phone, userName, case when userType=0 then "超级管理员" else "管理员" end userTypeStr, DATE_FORMAT(createTime,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") createTime, DATE_FORMAT(lastLoginTime,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") lastLoginTime from tbl_user where status = 0 order by userType,createTime desc

select id, phone, userName, case when userType=0 then "超级管理员" else "管理员" end userTypeStr, DATE_FORMAT(createTime,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") createTime, DATE_FORMAT(lastLoginTime,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") lastLoginTime from tbl_user where status = 0 and (userName = #{userName} or phone = #{phone}) limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_user(uId,loginTime,ip) values (#{uId}, now(), ip)
